name: Clarion Collection Hotel Mayfair

reviews.text: Nice, well-equipped hotel in a very central location (near the main station and Tivoli gardens). However, the area is a teeny bit dodgy - there's a strip bar directly opposite the hotel and if you get a room by the road you may suffer from some very drunk people shouting through the night as they wander home. Otherwise, very helpful staff and good sized rooms with everything you'd expect from a 3-star.
reviews.title: Comfortable but noisy

reviews.text: The Comfort Mayfair was clean, quiet and comfortable if a little old fashioned. Staff were polite and efficient. My single room had a shower only but it worked well. Liquid soap only provided so take your own toiletries if you do not like this. Excellent electronic safe in the room, free internet access in the lobby. Free light buffet, Mon-Thurs evenings. Very good breakfast for under £10. On the edge of the Red Light district but caused no problems. Very close to the railway station and the Tivoli gardens.
reviews.title: Good value hotel
Good Central Place To Stay
reviews.text: I stayed at the hotel along with a large group of people all visiting Copenhagen for the Speedway Grand Prix event at the big Parken stadium in the city. The hotel is well positioned with only 3 min walk to Tivili Gardens and the central station, the information tourist centre is oppisite the station and in there they speak very good english to help and assist you with whats to see and do in the city.

reviews.title: Good experience
reviews.text: I stayed in a single room which wasnt overly spacious but i didnt really need any room being on my own, i almost found it quite cosy. You enter the room with a large cuboard in the front of you. To the right was the en suite consisting of shower, toilet and hand basin and then in a separate room was the main bedroom. In the main bedroom was a very large single bed or a small double, to side tables, a desk, large tv with satalite channels, tea and coffee facilities and trouser press. I would advise if you are making tea and coffee with milk to ask at reception for proper milk as the power cream they provide in the rooms in gastly!

reviews.title: Cosy, comfortable, and basically nice !
reviews.text: For breakfast it is served between 6.30 - 10.30 monday to friday and 7-10.30 on weekends. Its basic to say the least, continental style. Food includes cereal, youghurt, pastries, bread, cheese, ham, fruit and boiled eggs. Also fruit juice and tea and coffee are served. Its basic but quite ample.

description: Appealing Hotel located in heart of town, a few minutes walk from Tivoli Gardens, Radhuspladsen, Central station & air terminal.
